text: Iki, Alatala, Isirayilaa Ala, i mɔn xa i ya falan nakamali, i layirin naxan tongo n fafe Dawuda xa, i bata yi a fala a xa, i naxa, ‘I ɲɔxɔ yibiran mi ɲanɲɛ n yɛtagi mumɛ Isirayilaa mangaya gbɛdɛni, fanni i yixɛtɛne n ma kiraan suxuma, e sigan ti n yɛtagi alo i sigan tixi n yɛtagi kii naxan yi.’
